Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION innovator.Select_work_est_for_rollup(@work_est INTEGER, @act_duration INTEGER, @work_day_duration INTEGER) RETURNS INTEGER AS BEGIN RETURN Isnull(@work_est, ( CASE WHEN @act_duration > 0 THEN @act_duration ELSE 0 END ) * @work_day_duration) END
Item.name: select_work_est_for_rollup
